channel.title: Kettlebell EMOM Builder
channel.description: Stronger through structure. Train for decades, not for likes. Smart kettlebell workouts built in seconds.

item.title: How a Herniated Disc (and a Lot of Squats) Led Me to Build My Own Kettlebell App
item.description: From chronic back pain to a 110kg deadlift: my journey of building a time-efficient training system that works.

item.title: Structure Beats Motivation Every Time
item.description: Motivation is fleeting. Structure is permanent. Here's why building systems matters more than feeling motivated.

item.title: Welcome to Kettlebell EMOM Builder
item.description: Stronger through structure. Welcome to a different approach to sustainable strength training.

item.title: v1.3.0: Built for Reality, Shaped by You
item.description: Why I added the Skip button, launched Lifetime Access, and doubled down on training structure over hype.

item.title: Why Kettlebells Work for Sustainable Strength
item.description: Kettlebells aren't just another fitness trend. Here's why they're the most efficient tool for building long-term strength.
